name: ScubaBear
description:
This is one of my older games, a fun and carefree platformer made for Ludum Dare 29. Also one of my first 'complete' game projects. The game kind of shows it's age but I thought I'd upload it for completeness sake. :)

ScubaBear is a collecting and exploration game. A true Beneath the Surface Metroidvania! Scuba the bear aims to collect all of the hidden treasures of poseidon.

As you collect treasures with ScubaBear your set of abilities will grow and you can explore even more areas. Finally, when you collect all of the treasure you can be proud to call yourself the true King of the Sea.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys and 'D','F','return' keys

Some game controllers are also supported.

Credits:

  • All audio: Shannon Mason 'Pongball'
  • Art / programming: Richard Lems 'Rilem'
  • Art / Level design: Diane de Wilde 'Ziryf'

Known issues: - Artifacts between tiles on older browsers. - Random flickering on outdated graphics cards / drivers. - empty chest *fixed*
